channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Seventy potholes along Bridge Street Cheltenham, 5th January
item.description:
There are a great many potholes along Bridge Street causing damage to local vehicles - the entire road surface needs attention. Please could you let me know if there are any plans to ameliorate the situation? Many thanks, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Richards Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe road conditions, multiple potholes, 5th January
item.description:
Hi there The whole of Richards Road and Bridge Street are absolutely riddled with potholes and cracked tarmac. It's really neglected and needs urgent restoration. Thanks, Tabi Joy

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Richards Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to footpath and potholes at corner of All Saints Villas Road/All Saints Road, 5th January
item.description:
Damage to pavement where the houses are being built at the end of All Saint's Villas Road. Also a deep pothole at the corner of the road (dangerous for all road users turning into such a busy road.)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 41 All Saints Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sreet lights are out in half of Arle Road, 5th January
item.description:
Have been out for 5 nights now. From arle stores to arle gardens
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 209 Arle Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked ditch, 5th January
item.description:
During rain the ditch above entrance to the new development is blocked and water is breaching ditch and flowing across the road on the bend. In addition water also flows out of the development entrance across the road when it rains moderately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
